name: Zikr After Fajr
bangla: Glory be to Allah and praise is for Him
fazilat: If recited 3 times in the morning, Allah forgives sins.

name: Tasbih After Fajr
fazilat: Good deeds increase and sins are erased.

name: Tahmid After Fajr
bangla: All praise is due to Allah

name: Zikr After Asr
bangla: There is no deity except Allah
fazilat: The heart becomes soft and faith is strengthened.

name: Dua After Maghrib
bangla: O Allah, protect me from the Hellfire

name: Zikr After Isha
fazilat: Sins are forgiven and the heart is purified.

name: Before Sleeping Zikr
arabic: سُبْحَانَ اللّٰهِ ٣٣، الْحَمْدُ لِلّٰهِ ٣٣، اللّٰهُ أَكْبَرُ ٣٤
fazilat: The best zikr before sleeping; brings peace to the mind.

name: Sleeping Dua
bangla: In Your name, O Allah, I die and I live
fazilat: Grants safety and blessings during sleep.

name: Morning Zikr
arabic: لَا إِلٰهَ إِلَّا اللّٰهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ
bangla: There is no god except Allah alone, without partner
fazilat: Equivalent reward of freeing ten slaves.

name: Evening Zikr
bangla: Glory and praise be to Allah
fazilat: Even sins as much as sea foam are forgiven.
